name: Crazy Killer (itch) (Hiupo)
description:
Crazy Killer is a game where you embody a men who just comit murder. Someone saw you and call the 911,  you are on the run to avoid being arrested by  the police.

HOW TO PLAY

Press ◀️or ▶️ to dodge the barriers. Unfortunately, you will rush on cute animals but sacrifice must be made to escape the police men. But, this will increase you speed.

CREDITS

Ulysse REGNIER - Project Manager, Developper

Hippolyte GUILLEMETEAU - Developper, UI/UX Manager

Victor MOMMALIER - Developper, Sound Designer

Etienne MOULIN - Graph

Anouk VAN GRIEKEN - Graph, Communication, Supply of troops

Johan GUERRERRO - Motivation support

This game has been developped during the Enjam 2021, a  game jam organized by the BDE of the Enjmin.

PS: Enjoy the music
